public class Durandal
extends RampantRobot

Main class Durandal is a WaveSurfing, Guess Factor targeting megabot.

Author:
Matthew Chun-Lum

onScannedRobot

public void onScannedRobot(robocode.ScannedRobotEvent e)
Invoked when we scan another robot Steps: 1) Focus the radar on the scanned robot 2) Update our current location 3) Process the scanned event through the enemy manager and get the scanned robot 4) Update the waves we're tracking 5) Compute our next move 6) Target the enemy
